member.summary: Creates a set of mechanism constraints.
member.param: Alias to give to these constraints.
Whether each joint is allowed to move.
Minimum position for each joint, in m for prismatic joints or in rad for revolute joints. The joint is locked if the minimum position equals the maximum position.
Maximum position for each joint, in m for prismatic joints or in rad for revolute joints. The joint is locked if the minimum position equals the maximum position.

member.summary: Constrains the position of a robot in Cartesian space.

Minimum translation along X. The target X coordinate remains fixed if this value if null.
Maximum translation along X. The target X coordinate remains fixed if this value if null.
Minimum translation along Y. The target Y coordinate remains fixed if this value if null.
Maximum translation along Y. The target Y coordinate remains fixed if this value if null.
Minimum translation along Z. The target Z coordinate remains fixed if this value if null.
Maximum translation along Z. The target Z coordinate remains fixed if this value if null.
Axis around which the target is free to rotate.
Minimum rotation around the axis. The target orientation remains fixed if this value is null.
